name: Mutation Madness
description:
Enter the World of Mutation Madness!
Equip yourself with a powerful disinfectant gun and stand against hordes of mutant viruses to rescue Cell City from a devastating outbreak. Upgrade your weapon, unveil hidden secrets, and immerse yourself in non-stop action. Prepare for an epic battle of intensity and strategy!

Thrilling Gameplay: As a skilled scientist armed with a disinfectant gun, navigate diverse levels and maps to eliminate waves of mutant viruses in exhilarating combos.

Powerful Items: Use tactical in-game items like vaccines and antivirals to strategically enhance your gameplay and combat abilities.

Weapon Upgrades: Enhance your arsenal by unlocking powerful upgrades for your disinfectant gun, allowing you to tackle tougher challenges with greater firepower.

Mascot Companions: Team up with cute and fearless mascots to fight the virus and restore safety to the city!

Special Modes: Engage in special game modes, including the thrilling Infinite Mode, where you'll face endless hordes of viruses, testing your skills and endurance to the limit.

Virus Information: Unveil hidden secrets and gather crucial information about the virus outbreak as you progress, piecing together the mysteries behind the Madvirus.

Hard Mode: Take on the outbreak's deadliest waves in Hard Difficulty mode. Prove your expertise as you battle mutating viruses on a whole new level.

Achievements: Conquer levels, defeat foes, and accomplish special feats to earn a range of achievements. Demonstrate your mastery of the outbreak and earn well-deserved recognition.
